comment._content: Other images from this battle in Bain Collection: www.flickr.com/search/?w=8623220@N02&q=haelen

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Cropped from original Agence Meurisse photo shown at Bibliotheque Nationale de France's Gallica site, with following caption: " En Belgique : combats de Haelen et Diest : église de Haelen après le bombardement " [In Belgium: Battle of Haelen and Diest: Haelen Church after the bombardment]] Pub. Date 1914
